long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automate your MagicEden trading experience!
1. Go to https://ninja.susanoo.io/ , Connect with your Slope wallet that holding Susanoo NFT and enable Auto-approve transaction, or else you won't able to login to this Dashboard.
2.For the Collection column, you need to copy Collection name from Magic Eden marketplace like what i'm highlighting, after the / (edited)
3.Set your Max price and set your Sniper speed 500 and click Active Sniper.

REMINDER 
Remember only set the Max price with the price that you can afford, because the sniper is too fast. 


TIPS
If you’re using phantom wallet, you can create a new wallet in slope wallet and import the private key of the wallet that holding your susanoo nft into slope wallet 

You don’t need to move your susanoo to another wallet

-Before running the sniper, only have the amount of SOL you’re willing to spend to avoid buying more than you intended. 
- Use Slope wallet with auto-approve turned on. The sniper won’t work optimally using Phantom, as you are prompted to approve every tx. You can use the same wallet address, just import it over to Slope.
-The GenesysGo RPC is the one you see by default. You can change it to whichever node works best for you (varies by location).
